models.name: HM-LC-Sw1-DR
models.author: CV
models.description: HomematicIP DIN rail mount smart switch. This model is configured only for standby power usage of the smart device itself. The connected device(s) power usage must be configured by the user since it is possible to connect anything to it.

models.name: HmIP-FSM
models.author: CV
models.description: HomematicIP flush mounted smart switch with power measurement integrated. This model is configured only for standby power usage of the smart device itself. The connected device(s) power usage is measured by the smart device.

models.name: HmIP-BSM
models.author: CV
models.description: HomematicIP smart switch with power measurement integrated for outlets. This model is configured only for standby power usage of the smart device itself. The connected device(s) power usage is measured by the smart device.

models.name: HmIP-DRSI1
models.author: CV
models.description: HomematicIP DIN rail mount smart switch. This model is configured only for standby power usage of the smart device itself. The connected device(s) power usage must be configured by the user since it is possible to connect anything to it.

models.name: HM-ES-PMSw1-DR
models.author: CV
models.description: HomematicIP DIN rail mount smart switch with power measurement integrated for outlets. This model is configured only for standby power usage of the smart device itself. The connected device(s) power usage is measured by the smart device.

models.name: HmIP-FDT
models.author: CV
models.description: HomematicIP flush mounted smart trailing edge dimmer. This model is configured only for standby power usage of the smart device itself. The connected device(s) power usage must be configured by the user since it is possible to connect anything to it.

models.name: HmIP-FROLL
models.author: CV
models.description: HomematicIP flush mounted shutter actuator. This model is only configured to calculate the power usage of the smart actuator itself because the shutter motor connected is individual and can have different power draw even windows-by-window.

models.name: HmIP-PSM
models.author: CV
models.description: HomematicIP wall socket smart switch with power measurement integrated. This model is configured only for standby power usage of the smart device itself. The connected device(s) power usage is measured by the smart device.

models.name: HmIP-FSM16
models.author: CV
models.description: HomematicIP flush mounted smart switch with power measurement integrated. This model is configured only for standby power usage of the smart device itself. The connected device(s) power usage is measured by the smart device.

models.name: HmIP-BDT
models.author: CV
models.description: HomematicIP smart trailing edge dimmer for outlets. This model is configured only for standby power usage of the smart device itself. The connected device(s) power usage must be configured by the user since it is possible to connect anything to it.
